function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate supply of preventive supplies and antiseptics","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of monitoring and surveillance in isolation hospitals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate coordination of health services resulting in inadequate responses to health restrictions","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Change in work schedules due to curfew restrictions","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Increased working hours and vacation time for nurses","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exchange of nurses to address shortages","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Psychological problems such as panic, fear, anxiety, and depression among staff nurses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global misinformation and the \\'infodemic\\'","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of preparation to deal with psychological problems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on the psychological well-being of nurses during the covid-19
